# @krn/babel-plugin-react-native-batch-bridge-register-check

## Installation

```shell
yarn add @krn/babel-plugin-react-native-batch-bridge-register-check --dev
```

## Usage

babel.config

```json
{
    "plugins": [
        [
            "@krn/babel-plugin-react-native-batch-bridge-register-check"
        ]
    ]
}
```
